meanings.definition: Arranged in or constituting a constant or definite pattern, especially with the same space between individual instances.
meanings.sent1: The teacher always sits in the regular chair during class.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden grow in a regular pattern.
meanings.sent3: The ants formed a regular line to carry the food.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky twinkled in a regular sequence.
meanings.sent5: The clock's ticking was a regular sound in the room.

meanings.definition: Following a set rule or pattern; consistent.
meanings.sent1: She has a regular routine for her morning exercises.
meanings.sent2: The train arrives at the station at regular intervals.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meows were so regular, it seemed like a song.
meanings.sent4: His heartbeat was as regular as the ticking of a clock.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashing on the shore had a regular rhythm.

meanings.definition: Having the same shape or form as others of its kind.
meanings.sent1: The cookies were all regular circles.
meanings.sent2: The houses in the neighborhood had regular roofs.
meanings.sent3: The clouds looked like regular cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so regular, it almost looked printed.
meanings.sent5: The trees had regular, symmetrical branches.

meanings.sent1: The bus arrives at the stop at regular times.
meanings.sent2: The birds' chirping was a regular morning occurrence.
meanings.sent3: The clock's alarm went off at regular intervals.
meanings.sent4: The waves hitting the shore had a regular ebb and flow.
meanings.sent5: The streetlights turned on at regular intervals as the sun set.

meanings.definition: Conforming to a standard or pattern; usual, typical, or expected.
meanings.sent1: Her grades were regular and consistent throughout the semester.
meanings.sent2: The store had regular business hours every day.
meanings.sent3: The dog's barking was so regular, it became background noise.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed in a regular cycle each season.
meanings.sent5: The clock's ticking was a regular reminder of the passing time.
